name: Dark Feraligatr
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: Its powerful muscles allow it to move at a speed that belies its bulk.

abilities.name: Scare
abilities.effect: As long as Dark Feraligatr is your Active Pokémon, all of your opponent’s Baby Pokémon Powers stop working and your opponent’s Baby Pokémon can’t attack. This power stops working while Dark Feraligatr is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Crushing Blow
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those cards and discard it.
